"aboutUs": "Hope House Guthrie: Serving Hope, Moving Forward!Mission, Vision, and Narrative  Mission:  Serve the most needful in the community  Feed the hungry  Shelter the homeless  Provide safety for the hurt and neglected  Advocate for each person who comes through our doors  Vision:Empower individuals and families to overcome challenges and achieve their full potential  Make our community a better place for all  Facility and Services18,000-square-foot building with three wings:  Wing A: Men  Wing B: Women  Wing C: Families and House offices  37 large rooms with two single beds each, furniture, closets, and shared bathrooms (except for families)  Amenities: Towels, linens, blankets, clothing, toiletries, baby items, public shower, clothing closet  Life Transformation Program: Assists individuals with rebuilding their lives and families  Partnerships: Logan Community Services, Logan County Health Department, Department of Human Services, Child Protection Services, local Sheriff\u2019s department, AARP, Community Action Agency, Logan County Drug Court  Impact and Achievements  Served over 700 clients since opening in 2020  Hosted vaccination days during COVID-19  Supported numerous families in overcoming challenges and obstacles  Helped many single mothers transition into independent living  Provided compassionate and evidence-based services to families in need  Promoted thriving families in Oklahoma  Future PlansHope House Free Clinic: Partnership with OU College of Nursing in 2025", "notes": "", "contactName": "HELP DESK", "contactPhone":
